Package net.minestom.server.network.packet.client.handler

Class ClientPacketsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minestom.server.network.packet.client.handler.ClientPacketsHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClientLoginPacketsHandler, ClientPlayPacketsHandler, ClientStatusPacketsHandler
    public class ClientPacketsHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains registered packets and a way to instantiate them.

    Packets are register using register(int, ClientPacketSupplier) (you can override a packet id even if not recommended and not officially supported) and retrieved with getPacketInstance(int).

    If you want to fill the packet from a buffer, consider using Readable.read(BinaryReader) after getting the packet instance.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      protected static interface  ClientPacketsHandler.ClientPacketSupplier
      Convenient interface to supply a ClientPacket.
